name: Heartbeats
description:
Crash with the prettiest boys from the beat generation so you don't have to sleep on the street. 

Powered by RenJS!

*News!*

The game is now downloadable and saving works fine. The jam version can always be downloaded and played for free, but the new version (that supports saves) is paid.

If we make enough money from this, we will hire an artist so the game can have custom sprites.
